p: The dominant serotypes in the years 2010, 2013, and 2016 outbreaks were DENV-1, DENV-2 and DENV-1 respectively. Interestingly, we detected DENV-1, 2 and 3serotypes in our sample in 2017. Although the DENV serotypes circulating in Nepal have been reported only for 2006, 2010, 2013, and 2016, however, this is second reporting of DENV-3 since 2006 [ 8].
